AI Description: Global Arrays is a software development toolkit that enables efficient and scalable parallel computing on distributed memory systems. It provides a shared-memory style programming interface for parallel computing, allowing users to work with distributed multi-dimensional arrays.
Core Features: Shared-Memory Style Programming Interface, Support For Distributed Multi-Dimensional Arrays, Efficient & Scalable Parallel Computing On Distributed Memory Systems
General Tags: Software Development Toolkit, Parallel Computing, Distributed Memory Systems
